org.apache.camel.spi

Interface Language

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    BeanLanguage, ConstantLanguage, ExchangePropertyLanguage, FileLanguage, HeaderLanguage, LanguageSupport, RefLanguage, SimpleLanguage, TokenizeLanguage, XMLTokenizeLanguage, XPathLanguage

    public interface Language
    Represents a language to be used for Expression or Predicate instances
    Version:
